Code Syntax

10 Nov 2019

To insert highlight code inside of a post, itâ€™s enough to use some specific tags, has directly described into the Jekyll documentation. In this way the code will be included into a .highlight CSS class and will be highlight according to the syntax.scss file. This is the standard style adopted by Github to highlight the code.
